oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate veterans Hugh Young Becton, Benjamin May Becton, William Julius Robb Becton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Left is Hugh Young Becton Ctr. Benjamin May Becton Right is William Julius Robb Becton. Benjamin May Becton served in Co. A, 47th Tenn. Inf. Regt. (CSA). He transferred to Co. C, 3rd Engineer Regt. (CSA) on August 1, 1863. Benjamin May Becton fought at Shiloh, Tenn. and Perryville, Ky. before transfering to the engineers. He had been a farmer before the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Becton, Hugh Young;Becton, Benjamin May;Becton, William Julius Robb
